languages.text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл — плечистый атлет, сверкающий ослепительно яркими улыбкой и лезвием силового топора. Все в нем, от носков великолепных сапог до кончиков волос, светится силой и стремлением жить и побеждать. Улыбка на его лице кривится, будто в любую секунду может превратиться в боевой оскал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл — плечистый атлет с ослепительно яркими силовым мечом и улыбкой. Все в нем, от носков великолепных сапог до кончиков волос, светится силой и стремлением жить и побеждать. Улыбка на его лице кривится, будто в любую секунду может превратиться в боевой оскал..{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered, athletic-looking man. He frequently flashes a bright smile no less dazzling than the blade of the power axe he carries. Every part of him, from the toes of his magnificent boots to the tips of his hair, radiates strength and the desire to live and win. His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл — плечистый атлет, сверкающий ослепительно яркими улыбкой и лезвием силового топора. Все в нем, от носков великолепных сапог до кончиков волос, светится силой и стремлением жить и побеждать. Улыбка на его лице кривится, будто в любую секунду может превратиться в боевой оскал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered athlete whose power sword and smile are equally blinding. Every part of him, from the toes of his magnificent boots to the tips of his hair, is beaming with strength and desire to live and win. His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn belligerent at any moment.{/n}

{n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered, athletic-looking man. He frequently flashes a bright smile no less dazzling than the blade of the power axe he carries. Every part of him, from the toes of his magnificent boots to the tips of his hair, radiates strength and the desire to live and win. His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}

His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}

His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、肩幅が広くてたくましい体つきをした男だ。朗らかによく笑い、その笑顔のまばゆさは彼が持つパワーアックスの刃にも劣らない。巨大なブーツのつま先から髪の毛先まで、カリゴスの身体全体が力強さ、そして生きて勝利するという欲望をむき出しにしている。笑顔はゆがんでおり、いつでも敵意をあらわにしたうなり声に変える準備ができているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered, athletic-looking man. He frequently flashes a bright smile no less dazzling than the blade of the power axe he carries. Every part of him, from the toes of his magnificent boots to the tips of his hair, radiates strength and the desire to live and win. His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、肩幅が広くてたくましい体つきをした男だ。朗らかによく笑い、その笑顔のまばゆさは彼が持つパワーアックスの刃にも劣らない。巨大なブーツのつま先から髪の毛先まで、カリゴスの身体全体が力強さ、そして生きて勝利するという欲望をむき出しにしている。笑顔はゆがんでおり、いつでも敵意をあらわにしたうなり声に変える準備ができているかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔生得虎背熊腰、体格健壮。他不时露出的灿烂笑容，就像他随身携带的那把能量斧一样闪闪发光，引人注目。从他的头发梢，到穿着战靴的脚趾尖，这个男人浑身上下无处不透露出强韧的力量，以及对生存与胜利的渴望。他笑起来总是歪着嘴，那笑容仿佛随时会变成充满敌意的咆哮。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered, athletic-looking man. He frequently flashes a bright smile no less dazzling than the blade of the power axe he carries. Every part of him, from the toes of his magnificent boots to the tips of his hair, radiates strength and the desire to live and win. His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔生得虎背熊腰、体格健壮。他不时露出的灿烂笑容，就像他随身携带的那把能量斧一样闪闪发光，引人注目。从他的头发梢，到穿着战靴的脚趾尖，这个男人浑身上下无处不透露出强韧的力量，以及对生存与胜利的渴望。他笑起来总是歪着嘴，那笑容仿佛随时会变成充满敌意的咆哮。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale es un hombre atlético de anchos hombros. A menudo lanza una sonrisa tan reluciente como el filo de su hacha de energía. Cada parte de su ser, desde sus imponentes botas a las puntas de su pelo, desprende fuerza y el deseo de vivir y ganar. Su sonrisa es retorcida, como si fuese a convertirse en un gruñido hostil en cualquier momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered, athletic-looking man. He frequently flashes a bright smile no less dazzling than the blade of the power axe he carries. Every part of him, from the toes of his magnificent boots to the tips of his hair, radiates strength and the desire to live and win. His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale es un hombre atlético de anchos hombros. A menudo lanza una sonrisa tan reluciente como el filo de su hacha de energía. Cada parte de su ser, desde sus imponentes botas a las puntas de su pelo, desprende fuerza y el deseo de vivir y ganar. Su sonrisa es retorcida, como si fuese a convertirse en un gruñido hostil en cualquier momento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale est un homme athlétique et large d'épaules. Il découvre régulièrement les dents pour afficher un sourire aussi éblouissant que la lame de la hache énergétique à son côté, mais légèrement tordu, comme à deux doigts de se transformer en grognement. De la pointe de ses bottes lustrées à ses cheveux impeccablement peignés, tout en lui irradie la puissance brute et le désir de vivre. De vivre pour gagner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered, athletic-looking man. He frequently flashes a bright smile no less dazzling than the blade of the power axe he carries. Every part of him, from the toes of his magnificent boots to the tips of his hair, radiates strength and the desire to live and win. His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale est un homme athlétique et large d'épaules. Il découvre régulièrement les dents pour afficher un sourire aussi éblouissant que la lame de la hache énergétique à son côté, mais légèrement tordu, comme à deux doigts de se transformer en grognement. De la pointe de ses bottes lustrées à ses cheveux impeccablement peignés, tout en lui irradie la puissance brute et le désir de vivre. De vivre pour gagner.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterzunder ist ein breitschultriger, athletisch gebauter Mann. Sein häufig aufblitzendes Lächeln ist ebenso strahlend wie die Klinge der Energieaxt, die er bei sich führt. Alles an ihm, von den Zehen seiner prächtigen Stiefel bis zu den Haarspitzen, zeugt von Kraft, Lebens- und Siegeswillen. Sein Lächeln ist schief, als könnte es sich jederzeit in ein feindseliges Fauchen verwandeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered, athletic-looking man. He frequently flashes a bright smile no less dazzling than the blade of the power axe he carries. languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale; geniş omuzlu, atletik görünümlü bir adam. Taşıdığı güç baltası kadar göz kamaştırıcı, göz alıcı bir gülümseme çakıyor sık sık. Görkemli çizmelerinin maskaratasından saçının teline kadar her parçası; güç ile yaşama ve kazanma arzusu saçıyor. Gülümsemesi ise sanki her an düşmanca bir homurdanmaya dönüşebilecek gibi çarpık.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale is a broad-shouldered, athletic-looking man. He frequently flashes a bright smile no less dazzling than the blade of the power axe he carries. Every part of him, from the toes of his magnificent boots to the tips of his hair, radiates strength and the desire to live and win. His smile is crooked, as if ready to turn into a hostile snarl at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale geniş omuzlu, atletik görünümlü bir adam. Taşıdığı güç baltası kadar göz kamaştırıcı, göz alıcı bir gülümseme çakıyor sık sık. Görkemli çizmelerinin ucundan saçının teline kadar her parçası güç ve yaşama ve kazanma arzusu saçıyor. Gülümsemesi, sanki her an düşmanca bir homurdanmaya dönüşebilecek gibi çarpık.{/n}
